Document.Focus: Preparing for surgery when you have diabetes

QAPair.Question: What is (are) Preparing for surgery when you have diabetes ?
QAPair.Answer: You may need surgery for a diabetes related condition. Or, you may need surgery for a medical problem that is unrelated to your diabetes . Your diabetes may increase your risk for problems during or after your surgery, such as: Infection after surgery (especially at the site of the surgery), Healing more slowly, Fluid, electrolyte , and kidney problems, Heart problems,
